attributes.action: Severely restrict the decibel noise output from all vehicles used on United Kingdom roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a law to severely restrict the decibel noise output from all vehicles used on United Kingdom roads to lower acceptable levels so as to not cause noise nuisance to the general public this includes CAR STEREO NOISE ouput and VEHICLE EXHAUST NOISE.Thousands of members of the electorate are complaining annually regarding this issue and at present the issue of noise pollution caused by the above described noise nuisance is getting worse by the day, increased noise levels also add to increased levels of anti-social behaviour and crime, let us all enjoy some peace and quiet as in the past.
